website_summaries.verdict: A basic, 12-inch doll that is the best pick for collectors or lovers of the internet sensation who want Pusheen without a theme.
pros: Pusheen in her traditional form – a must-have for any Pusheen collector or fan
Perfect facial expression with whiskers, just like the online character
cons: Rare incidents of tears or holes in the material

customer_reviews.title: Pusheen!
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of the best things I've ever bought. This plush is soft, the colors are perfect, it has a good face (no wonky eyes or anything). When I took it out of the box, my face lit up. Everyone in my family loved it too and they were all cooing over how cute it is.
customer_reviews.author: ToyBoxFox

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best plushie/ stuffed animal I have ever owned!! It came 2 days early and it is SUPER DUPER SOFT!! I was lucky and I didn't get one of the deformed ones!! I'm so happy!! Yay!! Very soft and cute. Adds a nice touch to my room :)
customer_reviews.author: Xmw

customer_reviews.title: Read Before Purchase
customer_reviews.text: First of all lets make this clear, the body of this stuffed animal is about 9 inches, but if you include the tail it is 12 inches, height is about 7-8 inches, the good things about this item is that its really soft, good material, however this is about the size of both my hands put together, its not a very big stuffed animal and its originally priced at like 25 dollars. Personally this item is way too expensive for the size of it, and i would be able to find larger products for cheaper. I give this product a 3/5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Darling kitty
customer_reviews.text: I love this little cat. I bought it as a present for an elderly friend who cannot take care of a live pet any longer. It is soft and cuddly and will be well-loved. It arrived sooner than expected, which is always appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Pusheen Cat With Soft "Fur"
customer_reviews.text: This Pusheen Cat by Gund comes in three sizes -- click on the sizes at the top of the page to see the different sizes -- and I bought the 12" one, measured from cheek to tail. It is adorable in that Japanese Kawaii way -- adorable in a way that's difficult to describe. As pictured, Pusheen is flat, front and back, with protruding whiskers, feet, and tail. It's about 4" thick. It's perfect tossed against a pillow on a bed, sitting on a shelf or desk, or just sitting in a lap to pet. It was well-made, not a surprise given the Gund name. -- Debbie Lee Wesselmann
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lee WesselmannTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: So cute and so soft and smushy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these as a birthday gift for one of my friends who loves Pusheen. At first I ordered the 6-inch one, but when it came I thought it was too small. Lengthwise, it was about the length of my hand.I debated gifting it anyway but I decided that it needed to be at minimum a squeezable, huggable size. So I ordered the 12-inch and it was perfect! Then I decided that the smaller one is just too cute, so I’ll probably end up keeping it for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY PUSHEEN!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this amazingly amazing product. My Pusheen came two days early, which made the experience ten times better! She is extremely soft, and very squishy! My Pusheen could compete with squishamallows- and win! I got the biggest size possible and trust me, it is worth the extra 3 dollars! Pusheen is exactly the size I would think she would actually be. Please buy this product, this is my all time best stuffed animal I have ever ordered and I am planning on buying many, many, more stuffed animals from here! All I'm pretty much trying to tell you is that everyone that made Pusheen put in double the time and effort required so THANKYOU pusheen-makers! :D
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Pusheen
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a freshman in college and I sent this to her in a care package. She loves it! Super soft and squishy, and very cute. The boys and girls in her dorm also love it and everyone likes to cuddle it when they're in her room. They call it an emotional support pusheen. ;) Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: GreatNorthGirl

customer_reviews.title: Gave this to my wife, who recently lost a ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my wife, who recently lost a chubby grey cat, that use to lounge on the bed. And she loves it! It stays on the bed right where ChubChub would have lain.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Well done and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is beautifully designed and executed. It's just exactly what you expect it to be and it's good quality. I ordered the 12" and thought it would turn out bigger, so you might size up? I wish I'd gone with a larger one since I intended it for an arm pillow for a friend when she's on her computer. But it's super cute, and not tiny, and she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Just like the photo!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fun gift for a friend with a tabby cat :) It's true to size (I thought it was going to be bigger but the description is accurate measurement.) And who doesn't love Pusheen?
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because I'm a fan of Pusheen, when it arrived and I opened the package, it was just Awesome! The material used is very very soft, the product quality is phenomenal!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Al-Mohaishi

customer_reviews.title: It's great. Nice size
customer_reviews.text: It's great. Nice size, very soft. I was between this and the larger one, but I believe the other would have been just too big. I like the comparable portability of this one, for jokes and such. The whiskers will be slightly off-kilter and not perfect, but you could say that gives Pusheen character. Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Cuddly
customer_reviews.text: This was a beloved Christmas present. We purchased it with the matching calendar. This version is just big enough to have some sort of good visible presence on her bed (about half the size of a standard throw pillow). It's not over/under stuffed... The stuffing is not saggy or lumpy in any any area. The shell is very soft...perfectly uniform and cuddly.
customer_reviews.author: Maura Ann Rubies

customer_reviews.title: The Original
customer_reviews.text: Pusheens are my go-to gift for my fiance. He may be a 30 yo mechanical engineer, but he loves these things! This Pusheen is the original and is the first one I got him. Since this one, I have purchased 7 more, so that tells you something right there (that I buy too many too soon and will run out of gift ideas!).
customer_reviews.author: Bat Girl

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute and Adorable and Soft!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it on sale and it was much more worth its price then. Buy this if you're a Pusheen fan! It's awesome, soft, cute, and the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Katherine Manuta

customer_reviews.title: A gift that brought a smile
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift, and my daughter loves it. It is soft and cute, though I prefer the Squishmallows personally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves it and so does Dad and Mom
customer_reviews.text: I got this and also Stormy for my little girl and loves them. She sleeps with them every night.
customer_reviews.author: gilee

customer_reviews.title: Cute and cuddly!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. It arrived promptly with no issues. Very cute addition to my apartment and it makes me smile every time I come through the door. It is well-made and can stand on its own. It has been a few months and I haven't noticed any fraying of the fabric, decrease in the plush or obvious problems with the threads. I would certainly purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: aly

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Its a great size, the quality is incredible and the price is amazing. My nephew loved this, great cuddle size.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkinix

customer_reviews.title: So sweet, perfect for a Pusheen fan.
customer_reviews.text: So cute, so soft! Pusheen is adorable & just the right size. Love the cute little lenticular tag that shifts Pusheen's tail up & down. It's like she comes with her very own .gif.
customer_reviews.author: latejune

customer_reviews.title: Knock-off plush
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this plus back in April 2016. I received a knock-off. The tag was in Chinese and the plush has a crooked face. I contacted the seller and never received any response and now it's June. Buyers beware, this is not the cute Gund plush you would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy kiddo, happy buyer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a 5 year old's birthday, due to their known love of cats. After 8 months, it's still a favorite. The face is cute, the body is soft and fluffy, and all the details are a perfect match for the Pusheen artwork. There's no sign of loose stitches or damage - not even after being swung by the tail, squished into boxes and backpacks, and many nights of bedtime hugs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Give it to my female friends and she likes it
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my female friends and she likes it. I give this toy her because I saw her twice noting this cat. I keep this in mind. I proposed to her and had asking her to develop a closer relationship with me. However, she has not intent to build a bf-gf relationship. Lesson learned. When girl likes a toy, buy it immediately and to find out the answer.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: My Niece loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a little gift for my niece. It is soooo adorable and soft. Good size too. I paired it with the " I am Pusheen the Cat" book here on amazon. She carries this plushie with her everywhere. I will probably get a few more for her. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lady Luck 29

customer_reviews.title: the funny thing is that I bought this for my cousin
customer_reviews.text: I really like cats and my cousin loves plusheen! She loved it as much as I wanted to buy myself one! lol you are never too old for stuffed animals if they make you happy
customer_reviews.author: archie

customer_reviews.title: ... a birthday gift for my daughter's friend and she loved it. They're really cute and seem to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this classic Pusheen as a birthday gift for my daughter's friend and she loved it. They're really cute and seem to be high quality, and the best prices I've seen on these so far are on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: Got this as gift to my niece. She loves it. Pusheen is always the flawless gift to anyone :-P
customer_reviews.author: Mimida

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This got my sister started on collecting Pusheen. Simplistic design looks great on high shelves for cute rooms.
customer_reviews.author: David Wendel

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: I thought this plushie would be small since I got the 12" one, but it is huge!!!! My sister is going to flip out when she gets this for Christmas. Worth every penny for a Pusheen lover.
customer_reviews.author: BattleYoshi

customer_reviews.title: i recommend you buy this
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute!! i recommend you buy this! i bought this for my friend's birthday and she loves it! and the best part is that i didn't receive a fake version of it so it's not flat or anything!! and i might order another one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Mayme Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: My 6yr old son loved it
customer_reviews.text: It's a very soft and "cuddily" as my son said, he uses it as a pillow and it provides good support.
customer_reviews.author: SJH_Nomad_Tx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I will agree with the general rating of five stars for this plush. It is well made, soft and super cute. I can even use this as a pillow during naps on my couch.
customer_reviews.author: Max™

customer_reviews.title: Pusheen Kitty!
customer_reviews.text: Very squishy and well-loved cat. This is perfect. Exactly what we wanted. Daughter saw one at the local bookstore and it wouldn't have come before Christmas and I didn't have enough time to run out to the mall. Thankfully Amazon to the rescue!
customer_reviews.author: Lori M F

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I love my pusheen. I've had it for about a year now and nothing has been damaged. The whiskers and tail are still intact. This is a very durable and cute plush. I was a little hesitant to buy this because of some reasons that say that it isn't authentic, but mine was, so that is a plus! Would recommend buying this plush.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette S.

customer_reviews.title: Love that kitty!
customer_reviews.text: Another cute Pusheen for my collection.Works as anice pillow in bed
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Hollister

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson wanted this.
customer_reviews.text: He absolutely loves it. It is very soft. He is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and is exactly what is posted in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and is exactly what is posted in the picture. So soft and fuzzy, I find myself playing and drawing in the fuzz! Perfect for the price! And very cuddly! If you love Pusheen, then hurry and click that buy button as fast as your clicker finger can do it!
customer_reviews.author: Eryk Jalowy

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: So soft and great for cuddling. I received an authentic Gund Pusheen and am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The feel and cushion is excellent and my son is very happy
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old son is sensitive to texture. He saw one of these at Macy's and put it on his wishlist for Christmas. As i looked around Amazon there were cheaper options but this one is identical to the one we saw at Macy's. The feel and cushion is excellent and my son is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little plush!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little plushie!! Im so happy with it, its soft and a great snuggle! My cat also loves it as well...seems very well made! I cant wait to get more :)
customer_reviews.author: Willow Fox

customer_reviews.title: It was delivered pretty fast
customer_reviews.text: I got this cat for a girl I grew up with who was dying of a rare forum of leukemia she was going to get family pictures done and wanted her cats to be with her but she couldn't have them at the hospital and she couldn't leave her room so I got the next best thing but sadly she passed away before I could give it to her
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute. My 10 year old loves this for her room.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Alcantar

customer_reviews.title: Love Pusheen
customer_reviews.text: It's a good quality plush and I just use it as a decoration, but it's very soft and pleasantly squishy.
customer_reviews.author: flickagal07

customer_reviews.title: its soo firm yet squishy and comfortable like a good pillow
customer_reviews.text: The inside stuffing is something out of this world, its soo firm yet squishy and comfortable like a good pillow. The suede/fur on it is super soft, velvet, so fancy. This is extremely well made and not like a rip off or a Chinese knock off. I can't have enough of hugging this stuffed animal. Brings so much joy.
customer_reviews.author: H. Singh

customer_reviews.title: POOR.
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed with the product size. The description detailed it would be 12" in length, but the product I received is barely 6"...and I paid for the 12" price. Don't even bother buying this product you will be disappointed with the actually size. It is a scam.
customer_reviews.author: Tengfei P.

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Soft
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it's a Pusheen plushie. You know it's good. Why are you even reading reviews about it? Buy it now!
customer_reviews.author: That Fellow Who Buys Things

customer_reviews.title: It is a good size because it is big enough to cuddle and ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this cute kitty for my girlfriend. She loves it and keeps it on her desk and proudly displays it with the rest of her plushies. It is a good size because it is big enough to cuddle and small enough for easy storage. The quality of construction is good and the material is very soft. A+
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter squealed when she saw this; she loves ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter squealed when she saw this; she loves it so much! She has decided to collect Pusheen items and I will be getting her more of them.
customer_reviews.author: dreaming420

customer_reviews.title: Not the right size
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a 12 inch Pusheen. However, when we received our Pusheen, it is smaller than what we expected. When we measured it, it is only 9 inch. If we measured from size of face to end of tail, it will be 11 inch. Very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hsu

customer_reviews.title: Cute and cuddly.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my sweetheart. She pronounced it "Cuuuuuuuute!" And I got a kiss. That's a win in my book.
customer_reviews.author: D Mc

customer_reviews.title: Very cute & high quality
customer_reviews.text: What kid doesn't love Pusheen! My daughter sleeps with this stuffed cat every night and takes it on any overnight trip she goes on. Apparently Pusheen is popular with teens according to my daughter so I think this will be around for awhile. Excellent quality toy.
customer_reviews.author: The Millers

customer_reviews.title: Thin tail; may fall off easily.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. Pusheen's tail fell off.
customer_reviews.author: prettykitty80

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves toy but so does our real cats who like to lay on it as a pillow/cat bed.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Pusheen
customer_reviews.text: Super super cute! It is so soft and plump and it is made out of really good material! It is not a cheap product. If you are a pusheen lover, this has to be in your collection. Don't try to buy a pusheen for a couple dollars less and be upset of the quality. This once is worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lui

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the cat pillow! A little smaller than anticipated, but overall wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like it does in the pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend screamed when she saw it and hugged it for a long time. I got a kiss on the cheek. You can to! Buy buy buy!
customer_reviews.author: John R Pyburn

customer_reviews.title: It instantly became one of her favorite stuffed animals
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my girlfriend. It's the right size, and exceptionally soft, squishy, and cuddly. It instantly became one of her favorite stuffed animals, and a great choice for a Pusheen fan.
customer_reviews.author: Reuel Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter loves it. Came in plastic and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda kennerly

customer_reviews.title: SOOOO Soft!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter ordered this with her allowance but when it arrived, the whole fam fell in love with it because it is soooo soft!
customer_reviews.author: RnR

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than expected, but quality is good.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat misleading because the 12" measurement is the measurement across, and INCLUDES the 3" of tail. It is big enough for a child to hug, but too small for an adult. I may return this and get the larger plush instead.
customer_reviews.author: Foodie Esquire

customer_reviews.title: Great for Grandaught
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old granddaughter loved this. Honestly I had no idea what this was when she asked for it for Christmas. It is a stuffed toy. It was an adequate size. The smile on her face made for a great Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Mechell

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, adorable plush toy that stands up to a 9 year old boy's punishment
customer_reviews.text: Son adores Pusheen and this is well loved. Construction and stiching is solid and has held up to multiple washings and LOTS of holding, throwing and use. Fabric has not faded at all or shrunk. Can definitely tell it is a Gund. Perfect size for holding and sleeping with for children 6 to 12.
customer_reviews.author: glenn woodson

customer_reviews.title: An essential for any Pusheen fan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 12-inch version for my daughter who adores Pusheen. This plush is well-made -- outer fabric is soft and the filling is firm, but not hard. You could easily use it as a pillow and be comfortable. Based on the quality of this plush, I won't hesitate to buy the others that are available.
customer_reviews.author: DLG

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Quality stuffed animal. The stitching is great, my daughter loves this cat
customer_reviews.author: Jolenethecat

customer_reviews.title: Plush Pusheen? Obvious choice!
customer_reviews.text: It's Pusheen, and best as I can tell it doesn't have any harmful substances like lead or cadmium in it. So ... go nuts!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: It's this stuffed toy that my granddaughter had asked for for her birthday. But I ordered the coloring book and the I Am Pusheen book as well. I'm glad I did. The stuffed cat was a "hit," but she may have loved the coloring book and book even more. :)
customer_reviews.author: Gail Kohntopp

customer_reviews.title: awesome, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: i got it delivered in 2 days, and it was excellent, just like all the rest of the GUND products loved it!
customer_reviews.author: bibimom

customer_reviews.title: Useful for mind control
customer_reviews.text: I sent my mother Pusheen emojis on Facebook Messenger every day for a year to condition her subconscious to associate me with the cat. I then bought her this magnificent stuffed animal that is the cutest/softest thing I have ever held, so that every time she looks at it she would be programmed to think of me. This is how you earn your inheritance, people.
customer_reviews.author: Daylon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected, but super soft, well made, no defects, and adorable. Would def buy again but with the quality stitching I doubt I’ll have to!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very soft!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It came nicely wrapped, and when I took it out it met every expectation. I got it for my uncle, and he says it's so soft that he now uses it as a cat pillow. Only weird thing is that it came in a bag that had a picture of a teddy bear that said "Pull me before display!" or something like that. It didn't affect the product itself, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper Holden

customer_reviews.title: We love Pusheen...
customer_reviews.text: We love Gund products. We have had a Gund Snuffles Teddy bear in the family since the 80's. The Pusheen is really cute, its a great rendition and the quality is perfect. Just wish it were a little softer like the teddy bear...
customer_reviews.author: Avid Dad

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, regular size Pusheen
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty! I love pusheen. It kind of gets deformed if you use it as a pillow or wash it on the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Prix

customer_reviews.title: Pusheen was the perfect companion/pillow.
customer_reviews.text: This plush was purchased for my mom when she was in the hospital. She has 3 cats at home but missed them after a long stay post-surgery. Pusheen was the perfect companion/pillow. :) He is definitely soft and true to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Love my Pusheen. Exactly as described and super soft. I can't wait to order more for my collection in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Cute, cozy and well-made!
customer_reviews.text: Cozy, cute, soft, well-made. My cat-obsessed 6yo loves that this one is a great size to snuggle in his little arms.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my sister
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my sister, however did not match image- the one that came was the cookie one, not the classic one. Sister still loved it though. Overall good item.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love PUSHEEN!?
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute and cuddly.. My child loves it even though it is a gift for a friend. :) It arrived in plastic and is exactly as pictured.

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this thing
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this thing. Im not really sure what it is but this is what they asked for so.....

customer_reviews.title: Child could use as a pillow.
customer_reviews.text: Display at public library: Cat characters with books (along with Garfield, Grumpy Cat, Pete the Cat, etc.).

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this. Not quite as large as I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this. Not quite as large as I thought it would be, but the size is accurate.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: It's a stuffed fat cat - how could it ever get a negative review???? My daughter adores it.

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Love it ...it’s the exact color as in the store

customer_reviews.title: Best Mother's Day Gift Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for Mother's Day( she and I are both crazy about Pusheen) and it was the best gift idea ever! She loves Her! The plushy it's self if a bit smaller than I thought it would be, but still the cutest thing on the planet.

customer_reviews.title: Pusheen!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute most perfect best-friend presents for two 13 yr. olds. Really great quality and unbelievably soft. This is the real Pusheen, not a cheap imitation.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Pusheen stuffed animal. Best purchase I made. Very hug-gable.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!

customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift. She was so excited to receive it. Cute soft huggable toy.

customer_reviews.title: Pusheen Cat
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! My daughter doesn't want to give away for a gift, she wants to keep for herself! Will buy for her tonight!

customer_reviews.title: so cute
customer_reviews.text: I love my Pusheen ! The quality of the Pusheen stuffed animals are always 10/10. Pusheen is super soft & has a very relaxing face.

customer_reviews.text: My nephew LOVES Pusheen! This is an awesome stuffed animal. Good size.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dvorak

customer_reviews.title: The stitching is tight and Pusheen is nice and firm
customer_reviews.text: A must have default Pusheen for any Pusheen lover or stuffed animal lover. The stitching is tight and Pusheen is nice and firm.
customer_reviews.author: CrankyRebel

customer_reviews.title: Well made and adorable
customer_reviews.text: Got this cute stuffed Pusheen for both of my daughters for Christmas. They adore Pusheen, an were thrilled with their new toys. This stuffed animal is really well made and huggable. I just wish they Pusheen products weren't so expensive, but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Shellywankanobi

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect size for little toddlers
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Material is soft and it is stuffed firmly. It is the perfect size for little toddlers!
customer_reviews.author: thejenspot

customer_reviews.title: Pusheen Cat
customer_reviews.text: So soft and adorable nice to cuddle. Granddaughter loved the cat. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: diana presing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, no mistakes in stitching, nor discoloration. It is VERY soft.
customer_reviews.author: Tocky

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It's very soft and super huggable! Looks just like the Pusheen drawings. It is the perfect thing to hug while falling asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Soft Kitty, Warm Kitty, Little Ball of Fur
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES his new Pusheen stuffed kitty. He says it's his favorite Christmas gift! It's very soft and nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: April A.

product_meta.title: GUND Pusheen Stuffed Animal Cat Plush, 12"
product_meta.description:
GUND is proud to present Pusheen — a chubby gray tabby cat that loves cuddles, snacks, and dress-up. As a popular web comic, Pusheen brings brightness and chuckles to millions of followers in her rapidly growing online fan base. This 12” plush version of Pusheen brings her adorable on screen “bop” to life in a classic pose. Surface-washable for easy cleaning. Appropriate for ages one and up. About GUND: For more than 100 years, GUND has been a premier plush company recognized worldwide for quality innovative products. Building upon our award-winning and beloved plush designs, we continue to practice innovation by constantly developing new original and licensed designs to appeal to the next generation of customers. To that end, each one of our plush toys is constructed from premium materials for unparalleled softness and huggability.

BRAND STORY
By Gund
feature_bullets: Pusheen plush toy in classic pose brings adorable web comic to life
Made from soft, huggable material that meets famous GUND quality standards
